#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t ;cin>>t;
    while (t--)
    {
    string a,b;
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
ll  i=0,flag=0,l;
for (ll i=0;i<5;i++)
{ flag=0,l=i;
for (ll j=0;j<5;j++){
            if (b[j]!=a[l++]){
            flag=1;
            break;
            }
            }
            if(flag==0)
                break;


}
    if (flag==0)
    cout<<"1"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
}
}
